post.author: Gbae
post.content:
The CH&A is looking for contract java and J2EE developers.
These positions are contract and located at GTA area.

Requirements:
The ideal candidate will have 3+ years of Java and J2EE development experience with Oracle database.

Contact:
cchoi@topchass.com  (contact until Jan. 27 morning)
post.title: Looking for Java and J2EE Programmers.
